## Task Execution Timeline

### Sequential Execution (Conservative)

```mermaid
gantt
    title Tutorial Creation Timeline (6 Weeks)
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section Beginner
    Tutorial 1-3 (T1)       :t1, 2025-10-24, 1w
    section Intermediate
    Tutorial 4-5 (T2.1-2)   :t2a, after t1, 1w
    Tutorial 6-7 (T2.3-4)   :t2b, after t2a, 1w
    section Advanced
    Tutorial 8-9 (T3.1-2)   :t3a, after t2b, 1w
    Tutorial 10 (T3.3)      :t3b, after t3a, 3d
    section Finalize
    Index (T4)              :t4, after t3b, 2d
    Review (T5)             :t5, after t4, 1w
```

### Parallel Execution (Aggressive)

```mermaid
gantt
    title Tutorial Creation Timeline (3 Weeks)
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
```

## Success Criteria Summary

### Per Tutorial
- âœ… Word count: 1,000-2,000 words
- âœ… Code examples: All runnable and tested
- âœ… Diagrams: At least 1 Mermaid diagram
- âœ… Exercises: Hands-on, step-by-step
- âœ… Troubleshooting: Common issues covered
- âœ… Success checklist: Clear verification steps
- âœ… Next steps: Recommended follow-up tutorials

### Overall Project
- âœ… 10 tutorials completed
- âœ… Master index created
- âœ… All code tested
- âœ… User testing completed (2-3 users per tutorial)
- âœ… ReviewAgent score: 90+ for all tutorials
- âœ… Documentation quality: Production-ready

## Key Differentiators

### What Makes These Tutorials Unique?

1. **Hands-On Focus**: Every tutorial includes practical exercises
2. **Real-World Examples**: Production-ready code, not toy examples
3. **Troubleshooting First**: Common issues addressed proactively
4. **Visual Learning**: Mermaid diagrams for complex concepts
5. **Progressive Difficulty**: Clear path from beginner to expert
6. **AI-Powered**: Written by CoordinatorAgent, reviewed by ReviewAgent
7. **Open Source**: Community contributions welcome
